dict.string: The change must lie at least at this value - otherwise the Input is not passed through
The currently read value which is compared to the threshold and the ChangeBy parameter

This patch only passes through values if they are greater than a specified threshold and the new value compared to the preceiding one is larger than the absolute difference of the new and the old value. This has a filter effect to smoothen small differences in input values.
The value to be passed through the threshold. It only changes if the described conditions are fulfilled, otherwise the old value remains as output.
